did.abstract: Photocopy of Clarence Wheeler's Certificate of Membership to Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employees of America.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of Clarence Wheeler's Certificate of Membership to Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employees of America.
